XZ2 Premium can reach a maximum ISO of 51,200. Videos go as high as 12,800. Normally anything you’d get at those numbers on a smartphone would look like grainy garbage, but Sony claims its “AUBE fusion image signal processor” can combine the data of both sensors, optimize for low light, and reduce noise so you get usable results. We’ll have to see how it actually pans out in real world use, but Sony claims this allows for “ultra-low-light capture previously only seen in interchangeable lens cameras.”

The dual camera system will also have a portrait feature (which Sony simply calls Bokeh mode) and will let you shoot using only the monochrome sensor for crisp, detailed black and white shots. Oddly, these two features won’t be on the XZ2 Premium at launch and will arrive in a Q3 software update.

XZ2 Premium can reach a maximum ISO of 51,200. Videos go as high as 12,800. Normally anything you’d get at those numbers on a smartphone would look like grainy garbage, but Sony claims its “AUBE fusion image signal processor” can combine the data of both sensors, optimize for low light, and reduce noise so you get usable results. We’ll have to see how it actually pans out in real world use, but Sony claims this allows for “ultra-low-light capture previously only seen in interchangeable lens cameras.”

The dual camera system will also have a portrait feature (which Sony simply calls Bokeh mode) and will let you shoot using only the monochrome sensor for crisp, detailed black and white shots. Oddly, these two features won’t be on the XZ2 Premium at launch and will arrive in a Q3 software update.

係台灣網見可以裝返夜間模式
有冇巴打試過?

夜間模式回歸
目前夜間模式僅有只有XZ2有 其餘機種皆會被拔除
加回條件 android 8.0 + SONY 3月版更新
需準備PC*1 + 需要軟體 + adb 指令
需要軟體: https://mega.nz/#!4QchALba!pujltCqAL1BCQqh2KYZ2Lzix6oGj9V-B3AwuEQQ-kAg

軟體內含2個資料夾分別為
Night_Light (丟手機)
platform-tools (丟電腦C:槽)
需到sony 官方抓驅動 找到你該型號的手機
驅動: https://developer.sony.com/develop/drivers/


準備好上面那些東西後

1.platform-tools 解壓縮後整包丟到電腦C槽下
2.將Night_Light 解壓縮後 內含2個文件夾 麻煩創一個資料夾-Night_Light 將 META-INF 及 system 統整放進去Night_Light 再丟到手機/SD卡皆可
3.手機端先安裝Night_Light內的東西-system 資料夾內點到底有一個APK可以安裝 "android.res.night"
4.手機端要開啟「USB除錯」，進入手機設定>應用程式>開發者模式>USB除錯打開
5.先到 sony 官方抓驅動 抓你手機的驅動下載下來後解壓縮 再到 到電腦的裝置管理員 →可攜式裝置→更新驅動程式→選擇瀏覽電腦上的驅動程式→從我電腦上可用驅動清單挑選→找到MTP USB裝置安裝
6.開啟電腦的 開啟命令提示字元cmd 輸入
(1)cd\
(2)cd C:\platform-tools
(3)adb devices (查看是否順利連接若有會跑出手機序號)
(4)adb.exe shell cmd overlay enable --user 0 android.res.night 輸入第一次
(5)此時手機會跳出允許USB偵錯嗎 請按確定
(6)adb.exe shell cmd overlay enable --user 0 android.res.night 再輸入二次完成
(7)輸入EXIT 結束CMD視窗

7.手機重開機後再到顯示 就有夜燈模式選項可以啟動
